body.p: You can find the version number for the current stable version of kubectl at . At the time of writing, the stable version is 1.13.

However, this version of kubectl is not compatible with UCP 3.0.*. Instead, you need to install an earlier version, for example, v1.10.4. To download this specific version, follow the instructions below.
body.codeblock:
# version=v1.10.4 # wget -O kubectl https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/${version}/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl # chmod +x ./kubectl # sudo mv ./kubectl /usr/local/bin/kubectl
